description.text: Army's Heaven is a Single Player/Multiplayer FPS game that makes use of PUN2 (Photon Unity Package) for its multiplayer backend. Originally conceived as a multiplayer project, the game currently features a deathmatch mode and offers a selection of two distinct maps.
I am currently focusing on the single player mode that will provide a campaign of a few hours, and introduce all the mechanics that I will transfer back in the multiplayer modes.
Here are some of the things I am currently working on:

items: Replacing the current hand rig with new ones from an asset pack (introducing new guns, new animations, etc..).
Replace shooting system with the one used in the multiplayer.
Fix any potential issues with the zombies/npc AI that will (for sure) arise at the end of the refactor.
Implementing an event system similar to the one used in 'Deck Planner'.
